[[=]]
++ What is this?
[[/=]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]

Customizable personnel ID cards that can serve both decorative & informative purposes. 

While primarily inspired by [[[component:id-card |ID Card Component]]], it has adopted a vertical, more compact layout with an additional "facility" field.

[[/div]]

[[=]]
----
++ How to use?
----
[[/=]]

To use this component, copy the following code and paste it in any place in your article in a new line. Then read the short instruction below and fill in the fields as you need.

You can put multiple ID cards on one single page, and each of them can carry different information.

[[div class="blockquote"]]
@@[[include :scp-wiki:component:v-id-card@@
|portrait= [[span class="desc"]] {{Photo URL. If left blank, it will appear as a broken image icon.}} [[/span]]
|portrait-bg-color= [[span class="desc"]] {{Optional. Accept [*https://www.w3schools.com/cssref/css_colors.php color names], RGB, or HEX values. Background color for the ID photo (Default color is transparent). Can be useful when your picture has a transparent background. }} [[/span]]
|portrait-gradient= [[span class="desc"]] {{Optional. 1/2/3 or other keywords. Background gradient preset for the ID photo. See below for a preview.}} [[/span]]
|name= [[span class="desc"]]{{Full Name. You can disable automatic line breaking (see below for details), or make a new line if the word is broken at an undesired place. Same hereinafter.}}[[/span]]
|department= [[span class="desc"]]{{Department}}[[/span]]
|position= [[span class="desc"]]{{Job Position}}[[/span]]
|facility= [[span class="desc"]]{{Facility of Service}}[[/span]]
|class= [[span class="desc"]]{{A/B/C/D/E}}[[/span]]
|level= [[span class="desc"]]{{0-5, specify}}[[/span]]
|number= [[span class="desc"]]{{Serial Number}}[[/span]]
|issue= MM/YYYY[[span class="desc"]] {{Card issue time.}}[[/span]]
|exp= MM/YYYY[[span class="desc"]] {{Card expiry time.}}[[/span]]
@@]]@@
[[/div]]

[[collapsible show="‚ñ∑ Color Picker" hide="‚ñΩ Color Picker"]]

[[iframe https://photokit.com/colors/app/color-picker/#amp=1 frameborder="0" scrolling="no" title="Color Picker" style="width: 100%; height: 550px;" sandbox="allow-scripts allow-popups allow-downloads"]]

[[/collapsible]]

If it works as expected, the barcode should be scannable. 

The card's default width is responsive, meaning it will change according to your screen size to ensure the best readability. The minimal height of the card is [[$ \sqrt{2} $]] √ó (Card Width), maintaining the same aspect ratio as [*https://paper-size.com/c/a-paper-sizes.html standard A paper sizes], which makes it easier to print.

[[=]]

++ More Technical Details
----
[[/=]]

[[collapsible show="‚ñ∑ Show CSS Variables" hide="‚ñΩ Hide"]]

++ CSS Variables

These trivial personalizing options are not included in the component due to redundancy. However, they are still kept in the code for potential use. 

For CSS veterans - these variables can be used to modify the default values (in the parenthesis). For separate customization, define them in inline styles instead of the global stylesheet.

[[span class="keycap"]]@@--v-id-card-width@@[[/span]]: Card width (150px + 15vw).
[[span class="keycap"]]@@--v-id-card-height@@[[/span]]: Card height. If set to a fixed value, overflow may occur and will be clipped.

/* Lato Black */
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Lato:wght@900&display=swap');

/* Libre Barcode 39 */
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Libre+Barcode+39&display=swap');

/* Global Settings */
:root {
    --v-id-card-width: calc(150px + 15vw);
    --v-id-card-radius: calc(var(--v-id-card-width) * 0.05);
    --v-id-card-padding: calc(var(--v-id-card-width) * 0.045);
    --v-id-card-logo: url(https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/component:v-id-card/scp-logo-alternate.svg);

    --v-id-card-bg-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
    --v-id-card-text-color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
    --v-id-card-secondary-color: rgb(175, 175, 175);
    --v-id-card-level0-color: rgb(230, 230, 230);
    --v-id-card-level1-color: rgb(58, 214, 55);
    --v-id-card-level2-color: rgb(50, 148, 255);
    --v-id-card-level3-color: rgb(255, 200, 38);
    --v-id-card-level4-color: rgb(255, 131, 38);
    --v-id-card-level5-color: rgb(255, 38, 0);

    --v-id-card-gradient-1: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgb(50, 134, 224), 40%, rgb(255, 255, 255));
    --v-id-card-gradient-2: radial-gradient(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(226, 224, 233));
    --v-id-card-gradient-3: radial-gradient(ellipse 100% 120% at bottom, rgb(200, 200, 200), rgb(21, 21, 30));
}

.id-card-vertical {
    position: relative;
    overflow: hidden;
    margin: 2em auto;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    width: var(--v-id-card-width);
    height: var(--v-id-card-height, auto);
    min-height: calc(var(--v-id-card-width)* 1.414);
    padding: var(--v-id-card-padding);
    border-radius: var(--v-id-card-radius);

    box-shadow: 0 0 calc(var(--v-id-card-width) * 0.025) gray;
    font-family: 'Lato', Tahoma, sans-serif;
    line-height: initial;
    background-color: var(--v-id-card-bg-color);
    color: var(--v-id-card-text-color);

    display: grid;
    grid-template-areas: "level level portrait"
                                   "data . portrait"
                                   "data . ."
                                   "data info info";
    grid-template-columns: 25% 1fr 46%;
    grid-template-rows: calc(var(--v-id-card-width)* 0.39) auto 1em 1fr;
}

/* Watermark */

.id-card-vertical::after {
    content: "";
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    opacity: var(--v-id-card-logo-opacity, 0.08);
    background-image: var(--v-id-card-logo);
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: 75% 75%;
    background-position: 186% 146%;
    pointer-events: none;
}

/* ‚ÜñÔ∏èTop-left part */

.id-card-vertical .level {
    grid-area: level;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    position: relative;
}

.id-card-vertical .level-bar-container {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    gap: calc(var(--v-id-card-width) * 0.013);
    width: calc(var(--v-id-card-width) * 0.39);
    margin-left: calc(var(--v-id-card-padding) * -1);
}

.id-card-vertical .level-bar {
    width: 100%;
    height: calc(var(--v-id-card-width) * 0.0267);
    background-color: var(--v-id-card-level0-color);
}

.id-card-vertical .level-1 .level-bar:nth-child(1) {
    background-color: var(--v-id-card-level1-color);
}
.id-card-vertical .level-2 .level-bar:is(:nth-child(1), :nth-child(2)) {
    background-color: var(--v-id-card-level2-color);
}
.id-card-vertical .level-3 .level-bar:is(:nth-child(1), :nth-child(2), :nth-child(3)) {
    background-color: var(--v-id-card-level3-color);
}
.id-card-vertical .level-4 .level-bar:is(:nth-child(1), :nth-child(2), :nth-child(3), :nth-child(4)) {
    background-color: var(--v-id-card-level4-color);
}
.id-card-vertical .level-5 .level-bar {
    background-color: var(--v-id-card-level5-color);
}

.id-card-vertical .level-name {
    font-weight: 900;
    font-size: calc(var(--v-id-card-width) * 0.19);
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 0;
}

/* ‚ÜôÔ∏èBottom-left part */

.id-card-vertical .data {
    grid-area: data;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: flex-start;
    justify-content: flex-end;
    gap: calc(var(--v-id-card-width)* 0.02);
}

.id-card-vertical .barcode-wrap {
    display: flex;
    align-items: flex-end;
    flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: space-between;
    gap: calc(var(--v-id-card-width)* 0.02);
    white-space: nowrap;
    writing-mode: vertical-lr;
    text-align: right;
}

.id-card-vertical .barcode {
    font-family: 'Libre Barcode 39', sans-serif;
    font-size: calc(var(--v-id-card-width) * 0.167);
    font-weight: normal;     /* Barcode cannot display properly on higher font weights */
    margin-left: -0.38em;
    transform: scaleX(1.2);
}

.id-card-vertical .barcode-num {
    font-size: calc(var(--v-id-card-width) * 0.067);
}

.id-card-vertical .issue-exp {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    white-space: nowrap;
    font-size: 0;    /* Remove <br> which takes up space */
}

.id-card-vertical span.issue-exp-title {
    font-weight: 900;
    font-size: calc(var(--v-id-card-width) * 0.043);
    color: var(--v-id-card-secondary-color);
}

.id-card-vertical span.issue-exp-content {
    font-weight: 900;
    font-size: calc(var(--v-id-card-width) * 0.056);
}

/* ‚ÜóÔ∏èTop-right part */

.id-card-vertical .portrait {
    grid-area: portrait;
    border: solid calc(var(--v-id-card-width) * 0.019) var(--v-id-card-secondary-color);
    aspect-ratio: 3 / 4;
    position: relative;
    margin: calc(var(--v-id-card-width)* 0.01);
}

.id-card-vertical .portrait::after {

    left: calc(var(--v-id-card-width)* -0.03);
    right: calc(var(--v-id-card-width)* -0.03);

0% 0%,

/* ‚ÜòÔ∏èBottom-right part */

.id-card-vertical .info {
    grid-area: info;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: flex-end;
    align-items: flex-end;

    gap: calc(var(--v-id-card-width)* 0.022);

.id-card-vertical span.info-title {
    font-weight: 900;

}
